landing.subtitle: Platform for entrepreneurs and small shops
landing.heroDesc: Products, sales, receivables, WhatsApp reminders and reports. Everything in one place, from your phone or computer.
landing.whatIsDesc: Platform for entrepreneurs and small shops to manage their business in one place: product catalog, sales, receivables with automatic WhatsApp reminders and reports. No hassle, from your phone or computer.
landing.helpsOrganize: Atelier Poz helps you organize all of that.
landing.useCasesSub: Everyday situations that don't have to be a drama anymore.
landing.useCase1Title: 11pm and the client who says «I'll pay you tomorrow»
landing.useCase1Desc: You've had the same conversation for weeks: «Can you send me the total?», «Yes, I'll deposit tomorrow», and the next day… silence. You're digging through WhatsApp chats, phone notes and a sheet with numbers you're not sure are up to date. With Atelier Poz you record the receivable, see who owes what and since when, and reminders go out automatically via WhatsApp. You just review; the system does the awkward reminder for you.
landing.useCase2Title: The order lost between stories, DMs and «I'll message you here»
landing.useCase2Desc: One customer orders via Instagram, another confirms on WhatsApp and a third says they messaged you on Facebook. In the end you don't know what's pending, what price you quoted or if you had that product. Everything's in screenshots and hope. With an online catalog and orders organized in one place, every order has its place, amount and status. Nothing gets lost in the social media void.
landing.useCase3Title: Month end: «where did the money go?»
landing.useCase3Desc: Month end comes and it's time to reconcile. Sales you wrote down in one place, payments you received in another, and what «they owe you» scattered between memory and promises. There's no way to know if the number in your notebook is real or a dream. With sales reports, receivables and payments received in one place, you see in seconds what you sold, what's been paid and what's still pending. No guessing, no drama.
landing.completeToolSub: To manage your business without the hassle.

landing.benefitsSub: What you gain by using Atelier Poz.
